data.oai_dc:dc: Raw data on flower visitation by pollinators, nectar robbers, and nectar thieves. Additional information on data collection methods and analyses can be found in the cited paper. Additional information about the dataset can be found in the associated README file.
anthocyanins|condensed tannins|factorial design|florivory|interactions|floral larceny|mutualism|nectar robbing|non-additive effects|pollination
